lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Rolf Løvland
[00:01.000] 作词 : Brendan Graham
[00:07.589]When I am down and, oh my soul, so weary
[00:15.980]When troubles come and my heart burdened be
[00:24.129]Then, I am still and wait here in the silence
[00:32.910]Until you come and sit awhile with me
[00:41.530]You raise me up, so I can stand on mountains
[00:50.200]You raise me up, to walk on stormy seas
[00:59.200]I am strong, when I am on your shoulders
[01:08.100]You raise me up… To more than I can be
[01:16.100]
[01:50.120]You raise me up, so I can stand on mountains
[01:59.200]You raise me up, to walk on stormy seas
[02:07.080]I am strong, when I am on your shoulders
[02:15.278]You raise me up… To more than I can be
[02:22.978]
[02:28.690]You raise me up, so I can stand on mountains
[02:36.158]You raise me up, to walk on stormy seas
[02:44.448]I am strong, when I am on your shoulders
[02:52.538]You raise me up… To more than I can be
[03:00.598]You raise me up, so I can stand on mountains
[03:08.709]You raise me up, to walk on stormy seas
[03:17.178]I am strong, when I am on your shoulders
[03:25.489]You raise me up… To more than I can be
[03:37.789]You raise me up… To more than I can be
[03:51.059]
tlyric:
[by:matthiasnichtda]
[00:07.589]我变得失落，我心已倦
[00:15.980]我遇到了困难，我心绪烦扰
[00:24.129]我在茫然中不知所措
[00:32.910]直到你来到我身边，临我而坐
[00:41.530]因为你的鼓舞，我才可以征服群山
[00:50.200]因为你的鼓舞，我才能够冒着暴雨破浪前行
[00:59.200]因为有你的肩膀倚靠，我才如此强大
[01:08.100]因为你的鼓舞，我才能超越自我
[01:50.120]因为你的鼓舞，我才可以征服群山
[01:59.200]因为你的鼓舞，我才能够冒着暴雨破浪前行
[02:07.080]因为有你的肩膀倚靠，我才如此强大
[02:15.278]因为你的鼓舞，我才能超越自我
[02:28.690]因为你的鼓舞，我才可以征服群山
[02:36.158]因为你的鼓舞，我才能够冒着暴雨破浪前行
[02:44.448]因为有你的肩膀倚靠，我才如此强大
[02:52.538]因为你的鼓舞，我才能超越自我
[03:00.598]因为你的鼓舞，我才可以征服群山
[03:08.709]因为你的鼓舞，我才能够冒着暴雨破浪前行
[03:17.178]因为有你的肩膀倚靠，我才如此强大
[03:25.489]因为你的鼓舞，我才能超越自我
[03:37.789]你鼓舞了我，我已超越自己
